name: Wyoming
notes:
8 staff have reported testing.  However, we're only tracking staff tests
 if the staff are out sick and are using special leave time granted by 
the Governor.  We have not mandated that anyone be tested, and our 
contract medical staff does not conduct tests on staff.  So the 
information we have is only based on self-reporting.  There could be 
additional staff who have tested that we don't know about.
